ParticleSwarmOptimizer

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticleSwarmOptimizer.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a particle in the particle swarm. Each particle has a location in the 3dim search space, given by its PID parameters and a best known local position.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nicolas Dutly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private PIDParams bestKnownParams
      Describes the particles best known (local) parameters
      private double eval_score
      We want to minimize this variable, which represents the MSE during a 4 second simulation.
      private PIDParams location
      the particles current position in the parameter space
      private ParticleSwarmOptimizer pso
      points to the particle's pso
      private double[] velocity
      describes the particles velocity in each parameter direction

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Particle(ParticleSwarmOptimizer pso)
      Creates a new Particle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void eval()
      Evaluates the particle's score by running a simulation for a few seconds and calculating the MSE
      (package private) void updatePosition()
      Updates the particle's position according the the pso formula.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        We want to minimize this variable, which represents the MSE during a 4 second simulation.

      • Particle

        public Particle(ParticleSwarmOptimizer pso)
        Creates a new Particle
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        void eval()
        Evaluates the particle's score by running a simulation for a few seconds and calculating the MSE

      • updatePosition

        void updatePosition()
        Updates the particle's position according the the pso formula. The particle's position are the PID parameters
